name: pummel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to hit someone or something repeatedly, especially with your fists (= closed hands): The boxer had pummelled his opponent into submission by the end of the fourth round.
informal to defeat someone easily at a sport: They were pummelled in the second round.
